statements: DELETE FROM art_museums WHERE museum_id = 2 AND total_artworks < 50;
DELETE FROM art_museums WHERE established_year > 1900 AND location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM artworks WHERE artist_name = 'Van Gogh';
DELETE FROM artworks WHERE museum_id = 1 AND year_created < 2000;
DELETE FROM art_pieces WHERE year_created < 2000 AND museum_id = 2;
DELETE FROM ArtCollections WHERE museum_id = 3 AND collection_name = 'Modern Art';
